website_summaries.verdict: Affordable outdoor lighting that is practical for numerous landscape uses.
pros: easy to place anywhere you need light
cons: Some buyers complain of dim light

website_summaries.verdict: Super-bright light. Easy to install w/reliable solar charge. The go-to choice for those who want a multiple-light configuration.
pros: Lights a 25-foot circumference w/no lag time on sensing motion
can be attached to surfaces w/outdoor tape
Charges without a full day of sunlight
cons: Heavy rain and extreme temperatures can affect reliability
Some users feel they are too small

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed, we have an L shaped yard and no lights on the back of our house to see our dogs in the yard at night. These four lights lit up our yard perfectly. They are motion sensored so they don’t stay on all night bothering our neighbors. They install quick and easy. They don’t turn on during the day wasting the solar life. The suggested charging time is 2-3 days but they started working as soon as it got dark same day that we got them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...seems to work just fine...will update as needed...also these were on sale which is why I got them in the first place Update on lights: 10/15/17, stated that solar panel last five years, LED lights last 50,000 hour's...NOT TRUE...already one light stopped working...lasted barely 3 months...
customer_reviews.author: Dr Gregory Butler HVAC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, they work great, and juat what I needed in certain areas around my house. They turn on their supposed to. I even have one in my basement to turn on in a dark room that has one small window and that also works great! The only issue I had when the package came was confusing a spot on the light that looks like a power button but it wasn't so when I pushed it it broke. I sent it back in the seller was great.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Grannan

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BRIGHT AND A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights a great!! No lag time when you walk out! As soon as I open the storm door, they turn on quicker then when flies hits the poo!! The 8 LED lights are way bright enough too!! I am ordering more for the back porch and for the garage!! If you have ANY QUESTIONS or CONCERNS, please ask me!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevinss

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to install these as we believed that they would be a great addition and add some ambience to our backyard. We installed them at night, and they didn't work; we assumed they needed to charge still. We ensured that all lights were placed in areas where direct sunlight hit. Night 2- still nothing; we assumed the gloomy weather was the cause. Night 3- still nothing (and it was bright and sunny all day). Night 4- nothing. Now we are certain that the batch we received was bad and will be returning them. Such a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson F.

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Dont work.
customer_reviews.text: The lights have been outside in FULL sun for 3 days now and none of the 4 come on at all when dark!! Only 1 screw home to attach them too. Other lights I've bought have 2 holes for a mich more secure attachment of the lights But NONE OF THE 4 OF THEM WORK. SEND ME 4 MORE OR RETURN MY MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: I am sadly very disappointed in these lights. While they do put out a decent amount of light for their size, you must walk so close to them for them to "activate". The purpose was to have a light that would sense motion and come on from at least 4-5 feet away. If I have to fumble around in the dark to walk right up to them before they even come on, then they do not do the job they were intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in heavy rains....
customer_reviews.text: Bought just before the rains hit Northern California. Installed in different places to test how they worked. They would work one day, not another day. Would stay on continuously until battery drained, wouldn't' response to movement, etc. They are still fixed to the wall until I can find a more reliable replacement. Interesting, that just before buying these solar lights, I bought Solar Power Sensor Wall Lights. Those worked like a charm. Even in a 48 hour period of continuous rain, they charged and responded to movement flawlessly. I wish they would make some of these lights to last longer than 10 seconds. I like when they stayed on for 30 seconds or more
customer_reviews.author: tonypc

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the overall performance
customer_reviews.text: When we received this product I was very excited. We installed them along a dark pathway. They fully charged , two did not work from the start. The other two put out very little light. Very disappointed with the overall performance. The second day the third light quit working. Sent them back and ordered a different light which I love. Puts out great strong light with a good width. I would not order these again. Went to the light below that I am very happy with. ALPHA 180X Solar Flood Light (Warm White LED) as Security Floodlight and Area Lighting for Farm Area, Yard, Home Garden, Remote Cabin, Alley, Warm White Light ALPHA 180X Solar Flood Light... Solar Light Mart
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Caughlin

customer_reviews.title: Good once they're working
customer_reviews.text: Works well once you can get them going. I bought the four pack of these and two of them arrived dead straight out of the box. I noticed the build was fairly simple and the back is held in place with four tiny screws, so I undid them and massaged the wires going to the solar panel and the battery right where they connect (figuring it was a bad connection), then clicked the on/off button again and they worked. So if yours arrived that way and it's too late to return them, I recommend giving this a try. One star off because I had to DIY it to get them going, but otherwise good, very bright, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Youn

customer_reviews.title: They're affordable and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They're affordable and very easy to install. They work GREAT for at least 2 or 3 months and then will begin to dim and before 4 months is up, they go dark. In fairness, I bought and installed 8 or so and 3 are still working fine. The remaining 5 have become nonoperational.
customer_reviews.author: Tom The Man!

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, inexpensive lighting option
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lighting, very bright, see before and after photos. Don't mind the ground light that's what I was using before. I used outside mounting tape by 3M to stick them to the side of the house. I like that they are solar and motion sensor to preserve the battery. They worked perfect for my dog. As he ran by they turned right on! And shut off as soon as he came back in the house.
customer_reviews.author: PerkReviews

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been looking for they have motion detection which means your battery will last a lot longer and not just stay on until they burn out and lights are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Lowkey1229

customer_reviews.title: For the first week or 2 they worked fine, after that
customer_reviews.text: I researched these type of lights and was very optimistic in how they were going to work. For the first week or 2 they worked fine, after that, not so much. The area where they are placed gets sufficient light for it to recharge during the day and there isn't a lot of activity in that area so its not a matter of them losing charge. I can see that they go on but there isn't any actual illumination of the area. I missed the return date on these so now I am stuck with them. Look at other options before you consider this.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected :(
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about these lights. Upon receiving them i proceeded to charge them fully before installing them where i wanted them. They worked absolutely fabulous for about 2 weeks, after those 2 weeks 2 of the 4 lights just quit working. I thought maybe they weren't receiving enough sun so i removed both of them and layed them out in full sunlight in the yard. Both lights did work again, but only for a couple nights and they were dead again. I'm guessing it was due to a defective charging system or battery maybe ?? not sure. Either way i was really dissappointed with them :(
customer_reviews.author: Ateam8774

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 days and seller was non responsive
customer_reviews.text: Immediately wrote seller to tell him one of the four stopped working. All were mounted on the house, and ask for guidance about what to do with the one since we did not want to take the entire set down from mountings outside. There was NO RESPONSE WAHT SO EVER. WE WERE VERY DISAPPOIINTED AS THIS IS AN AMAZON SELLER WHO WE USUALLY PUT OUR TRUST IN.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas

customer_reviews.title: lights seemed to be already used and parts missing but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 4 lights had dirt (soil) on them, they apparently had been used and returned. Also, there were only 3 sets of screws instead of 4. At first only 2 of the lights would turn on but after leaving them in the sun for a day, they are all working now. I washed off the 2 dirty lights and used my own screws to replace the missing parts and they seem to be working fine now. Will follow up on the review after they have been in use for a while. Updating the review after 2 weeks: All the lights seem to be working fine after i cleaned and charged them, so raising the rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights.  I liked them so much, I bought them again.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very rural area, and these have been great for a little added security, and for moving around at night where our single pole light doesn't reach. I bought four last year, and they still work very well. They are bright and sensitive. One time this summer I went out to clean the solar panel area, but otherwise they've went untouched. I did have problems getting one to turn out from the last four I bought, but I simply opened it up, angled the tool inside to turn it on, and haven't had a problem since. I'd highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Second time was the charm with delay
customer_reviews.text: I gather under other circumstances I would have considered the extra star. I have left my rating as is not due to the eventual function and use, but in the experience of receiving a first shipment which appeared nonfunctional even after nearly 40 hours of sunlight priming with extra delay required to contact the supplier, get satisfaction of reply with the second shipment which was eventually operational. I presume that most people experience less problems with quality control, whether power cells defective, aged or connections for charge or discharge similarly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Bright motion detector lights increase safety
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic. We solar powered and tested them first and they seemed quite bright. My husband installed them easily on our wood stair rails (he chose to use different screws then what was provided). The first night we walked up the stairs in the dark I was so excited at how well they worked. 4 lights spaced on 24 steps easily provided enough light, and they came on well in advance as we were walking. Best part is they turn themselves off. It's been 3 weeks so far and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Skoshi

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had these for 3yrs and 5mos
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 pack in Feb 2017. I installed one outside on my fence, and then forgot about the other three. The one that I installed has worked, and still works, great to this day. I live in south TX where the summers are very hot and humid, and the winters can get close to freezing. In 2018, we experienced hurricane weather and snow. All in all, this one unit took every bit of the weather from one extreme to the other. I’ve finally installed the other 3 lights and look forward to long-time use from them. Thanks for a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Old Rez

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a while. One light stopped working completely the other light started to loose charge rapidly and would die relatively quickly compared to the other two working lights. I contacted customer service and did not get an answer from them it’s been over two months now. I would not buy this again. Waste of money,very bad customer service. Update!! Another light just quit working. I was never able to get a hold of anyone from customer service. Don’t waste your money on this. !
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: VERY DIM, that is *if* they actually work at all
customer_reviews.text: I should've heeded others reviews! Unfortunately we couldn't even get 2 of the 4 to work most of the time & never all of them. When they did work, the light they emitted was the equivalent of the aisle lights on the stairs at a movie theater -- the ones that are there so you don't fall and die during the show. Ambient light at best -- helpful but not extremely bright. If you still want to give these a try, I suggest doing a trial run with duct tape before installing. It'll save you any headaches with returning. We sent ours back for a refund before we made the mistake of installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mama C.

customer_reviews.title: this sucks!! I charged it for two days and ...
customer_reviews.text: this sucks!! I charged it for two days and followed the instructions and they do not work, BUT........When i brought them in the HOUSE they kicked on in my kitchen when the light was on, so i took them back outside thinking they were working and waited for nighttime again and ...nothing!!! These are going back to seller!!
customer_reviews.author: jarvisjdaniels

customer_reviews.title: Idiotic \pin' needed to 'activate'
customer_reviews.text: First thing I should have noticed BEFORE I ordered these, is you Need a tiny PIN (supplied) stuck into a tiney, tiny, nearly invisible hole, to turn then on. The it's dicey whether it's actually on or off. . But if you take it into a dark place and hold it JUST SO, it comes on. Some have to be horizontal, some vertical, so it seems. My bad, I should have read the description more carefully. As to weatherproof, time will tell. Motion detection seems to be OK. If they last a while it's woth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wimer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be bright
customer_reviews.text: I know it's way too early to review these lights but it's been 2 days and they are meeting my expectations so far. I bought these lights pretty much to protect my chickens at night and with the motion detection I feel much better.. I also put two of these lights at the corner of the house. You can see the difference in the last picture. Update: after 3 days one of the lights was acting up so I went and contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement the next day. I'm giving it 4 stars because I feel like it was so early to have issues with the lights. Will see how they do after a few weeks/months.
customer_reviews.author: Georvanovic

customer_reviews.title: Not a dependable product.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. The instructions print is so very tiny even 20/20 vision cannot read it without a magnifying glass. Along with installation screw, the light comes with some little bizarre key that has to be inserted into another microscopic hole near the eye which again requires some magnification to locate. This key has to blindly hit and push some internal switch which is supposed to activate the sensory eye and illumination ability of the light. Its a difficult product to make work if you can get it to work at all. I purchased 4 of them. Two work, two do not.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I just love them
customer_reviews.text: My patio was very dark and even though I had a motion-detecting light, it was not enough, these lights are super bright and as soon as they sense movement they turn on and lighten my patio beautifully! I will definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Joselynn

customer_reviews.title: Lights all working now
customer_reviews.text: Such rave reviews for this product and one of the units never worked and one only worked for 3 days. Contacted seller and all I get is crickets. The two that work... very happy with them but I paid for 4 and that’s what I expected. Now I’m shopping for new lights... different brand and seller. So disappointed Updated post... Still no contact from the seller... Update- 10-20-2018 after emailing back and forth for a week I received 2 replacement lights in the mail today. Thank you for restoring my faith in customer service 💗
customer_reviews.author: SafetySharon

customer_reviews.title: Good light for stairs
customer_reviews.text: These lights are easy to use. They come with a little key, safety pin would probably work too, to turn them on. Simply insert and push straight in. Very slightly wider then a 4x4 post. Motion works great and they are bright. My only complaint is there is only a mounting hole on top. My dogs regularly hit them and knock them off kilter so they're crooked on the post. Finally, if you have a bright light source near them they won't work. I had one at top post where porch was, and porch lights kept it from coming on. If I covered solar panel it came on. I really didn't need it there and moved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Never Got Even A Glow Out of These Lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights never worked for us, not even a faint glow. My hsband moved them around the property & even in our sunniest spot they were dead, dead, dead. He bought some white battery powered ones that work perfectly for our task, lighting our dog's path across the deck to a side yard where she does her business. We love the dark sky at night so motion sensors are the way to go. Check out the International Dark Sky Association website for the benefits of a dark night without light pollution.
customer_reviews.author: Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 3 months now and they are doing great! Easy to put up and small size so not too noticeable . Very very bright light, wakes me up out side my window if something sets off detector - which is what I want if there is a human out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler33

customer_reviews.title: Motion only, only lights up for 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.text: The lights work. But I’m pretty disappointed. I guess it’s my fault as I misunderstood the description. The lights apparently will light up for 12 hours.... however I will never see this. They have an on/off switch. But the only option is the only turn on with movement. I was under the impression there was an option to turn on and stay on. SO very poorly written description. I needed to light up my back yard at night as I live alone. Now it just scares me to see a light is on as it has detected motion.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The design would have worked better for us if the light pointed straight down
customer_reviews.text: These lights work, but their motion detection radius is not a big enough arc for my purpose. We installed them on the edge of the roof line, which is the only way they can get sunshine. But then the angle of the light is directed out in the yard, instead of below the roof where our path is. So when we walk under the eaves, the motion detector doesn't see us and turn on the lights. We would have to walk outside the eaves (in the rain if it is raining!) to have the motion detector see us. The design would have worked better for us if the light pointed straight down, instead of out at an angle .
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for price
customer_reviews.text: One of the four didn’t work. But they’re pretty cheap. I was surprised how bright they were for the number of LEDs in them. Easy as pie to install. I got these because I’m cheap and I have several locations I wanted to cover, so I wanted a package with 4. If I can get the one replaced, great, otherwise I’ll have to buy another. They stay on a decent amount of time. Turned on when I walked three feet away from the wall but had to pass directly by it, didn’t sense me as I approached.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Useless lighting. Motion detection Ok.
customer_reviews.text: These charged up quickly and I like the fact they are not on until you press the switch with the pin. I tested all units before mounting. All turned on when movement was detected but the LED's, even though super bright when looking at the unit, don't shine out from the unit far enough to illuminate anything. Very disappointing. The motion detection did turn on within 10 feet of the unit. To mount the light there is only one hole for a screw at the top of the unit so that eliminates some options for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Just_me

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We live in a heavily wooded area and needed lighting for outdoor steps/garage area. We've tried solar lighting before but because of the woods, these haven't been very impressive. Bought these for a recently landscaped area of stairs beside our house, not expecting much from them. Charged them for one day in the sun and hung them up. (We hung these in a way that they can be moved to sunlight for charging. )They get virtually no sunlight where they hang. These are still going strong on one charge after two weeks. They emit a great amount of light, sense movement quickly and stay lit well. So impressed, I just ordered more of these as well as the "upgraded" version.
customer_reviews.author: aljarn

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY light.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are quite easy to install with clear instructions and bolting accessories included. Our home is near a stream, so sometimes little animal visitors wander on to the property.The lights 3 ft range is perfect along the side of our house facing the stream. Flashes on quickly enough to make us aware when animals happen by, and yet bright enough to discourage the little visitors too far beyond fence perimeter. It is not the brightest light, but the contrast to darkness of foliage at night makes it quite acceptable. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Island Diva

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, looking in the general direction of the light will hurt your eyes
customer_reviews.text: It's a bad design since looking in the general direction of the light will hurt your eyes because: 1) the LEDs are not covered in any way, yes it does make it brighter, but the light is also so intense that it hurts your eye if you even look in its general direction. Putting it at eye level is a non-starter. Other LED lamps have a cover for the LED bulbs inside. 2) the angle of the LEDs should face more downward. Again, unless you mount it very low near the ground or way high above eye level, your bound to be caught in the death-ray. Finally, the blue-ish color of the light is very unnatural.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product - activate by sticking a pin in the tiny hole on the front of the light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Makes tons of lights. I previously bought one and it lasted so far several months and still going strong. The motion detection function works well. This is one of the best solar lights I have ever tried. There are no instructions on how to activate it. You have to take a pin and stick it in the teeny tiny hole on the front of the light, once you do that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Emer Rand

customer_reviews.title: Think “YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE” (and use no electricity from your house)
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive and BRIGHT little lights. We have actually bought these after we had picked up a set at big box store. The solar panels seem to get a little discolored after about a year, yet they still function fantastically. We lined our walkway and placed two on the entry porch. Received many compliments from guest about how well they light up the walkway and doorway. I’m fact, the extra lights by the door improved our security cameras night-vision with better clarity. They seem to stay well charged and functioning even after a gloomy cloudy day too. I’ll buy more!
customer_reviews.author: flipnotrab

customer_reviews.title: it seems like only about half the lumens/brightness comes out
customer_reviews.text: Of the 4 lights I received, all worked well for the first night or two. Ever since, 1 works very well, 2 are finicky (only sometimes pick up a moving target) and 1 that almost never works. When it does work, it seems like only about half the lumens/brightness comes out. I live in California, so not much rain or moisture here. Is there a work around or fix to get them all working as well as the 1? Based on the 1 light that does work flawlessly, it is still a very good product. However, I have been frustrated and unhappy with the overall product.
customer_reviews.author: KC1082

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints here! - Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these August 2019. Works perfect as described. I installed them 90 degrees to shine horizontally on my entrance (I put some anchor screws under the side to hold them in place) and work as expected in all weather. Very bright and working as well as the day I bought them. If you buy these, follow the instructions and use the pin to click the light on/off before use. If they are not working outside (They will only turn on in darkness!), click the button and they should work. Will purchase more as needed! Excellent value for security and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: RoKiTo

customer_reviews.title: Always on - Short life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Lights/batteries didn't last 6 months. I bought them over a year ago, but since some older lights I have still work I thought I should leave a review. 1st, They are ALWAYS on, it isn't as clear in the listing as one would think, but they are "dimmed" until "motion" is detected or sometimes just go bright. I have older lights that look exactly the same that are still functioning by another brand/seller here on Amazon. These would be a quick fix for lighting needs, but in my opinion they are not worth it if you are looking for a longer fix than 4-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: HotRod

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These lights were absolute garbage. First of all, the listing is misleading. It says "8 LED" and then at the very end of the long listing title, it says "4 pack". I expected 8 lights. Next, 3 screws broke. Just broke. The head broke right off while trying to install. Then 1 light came with a broken, pressed in, power button as seen in pics. Finally, they've been up for 2 days and THEY DONT EVEN WORK!! The quality control here at Amazon is really getting disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tara m.

customer_reviews.title: Weak batteries make this a dud.
customer_reviews.text: Had to change out batteries on all eight. They come with a lipo cell marked 1000mah, I doubt if that is accurate. The charging circuit is fine but if these are placed in a medium traffic area the batteries will run out before the night is over. I replaced the lipo packs with 18650 cells rated over 2400mah. The solar panel charges these adequately and they hold enough charge to light brightly through the entire night.
customer_reviews.author: john m angelini

customer_reviews.title: These are not dusk to dawn, they are motion sensored
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the dusk to dawn set of these before. I thought that was what I was getting this time. I was at first a little disappointed, but I actually like that they come on with motion. It keeps my back yard nice and dark so we can see the stars. I ordered 12 and all arrived packaged good and all are working fine. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Light and Lasts a Long Time In all Weather
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to shine on my car license plate at night since someone stole my plate last year. I am pleased to say it has protected my car at night for almost a year now and not one incident ever since. The lights can be moved around wherever you need them. They would be useful in storms if your electric goes out and you need light as well. The motion sensor in the light causes it to come on if anyone walks by and that can give great peace of mind in unlit areas around your home.
customer_reviews.author: Rae W

customer_reviews.title: Lights were received with dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: I tried to replace the batteries, however they are a different kind then you can find most places. They are also soldered in so it's very difficult to replace. I got a set of three. only one works out of the three no matter how much sun they get. I'm here in AZ so believe me they get a lot of sun. I am still trying to fix them! they also do not seem to have much battery life. This is not an item I would consider purchasing again. Buyer beware on this one. Or maybe I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are easy to install, charge very well (and I have a fairly shady yard) and really light up the area well. Actually, they day after they arrived, my power went out from a bad storm. I had the lights sitting on my deck for 24 hours prior, so they were fully charged. I brought them into the house and placed 1 at the entrance to the kitchen, bathroom, etc., so when you walked into the room it was instantly lit up. Worked great! Didn't even have to pull out the flashlights. Now they're posted on either side of my privacy fence, plus the front steps and deck stairs. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pam from Little Rock

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is superb!
customer_reviews.text: Received these for Christmas for my very dark yard. Although I couldn't attach to the house due to how the roof overhangs I attached to weathered fence boards and put around the yard. Detection when walking by is nice, the brightness is great! So far the sprinkler hasn't affected them at all. Liked them so much I ordered another set as my yard is rather big. Just wish they stayed on a little longer, it seems as though they come on and a few more seconds they turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I've had them for three years, focused on a little alleyway behind our house that the cats travel frequently. They have detected motion at least five times a night for the past three years, and they are still super-bright. I'm actually going to buy more for security around my chicken coop!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey & Seth

customer_reviews.title: Lighting solution in rural areas without electricity.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on farm property that doesn’t have electricity yet. Easy to install on stock fence by adding hook threaded through hole for screw (nail bent to hook over fence). Also installed on outside of metal container which is used as barn by adding adhesive magnetic strips. We can also take the solar charged lights off the outside of the metal container and stick them inside when we need light inside. These lights are very versatile. It has taken some creativity, but I have not screwed in anything yet, but still have the option of Mounting them permanently if I ever want to. The range of motion is pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be attached with mounting tape!
customer_reviews.text: I'll give these 3 stars to start. Working well after prepping in the sun. HOWEVER, I intended to hang them with the use of double-sided mounting tape, specifically Gorilla Double-Sided Heavy Duty Mouting Tape. You cannot use this type of tape to adhere these lights to vinyl siding because it is not smooth! Against my better judgement, because it had to be hung on the siding, I drilled a hole and attached this by screwing it into my siding. I will be back to update how well these work!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mir

customer_reviews.title: Over 3 years outside, still going
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 3.5 years now. One on my chain-link fence and three on my shed (one on each side and one on the back). All but one are still working! Could be the broken one hasn't gotten enough solar exposure lately, I don't know. But I'm talking Ohio weather here where the temps go below freezing, there's tons of snow, and the sun is sweltering in the summer. I just happened to be outside chasing around my dogs in the dark, so I decided to review to let people know these things DO last!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica From Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I like the lights as a sensor
customer_reviews.text: I like the lights as a sensor. They brighten up the deck when I am walking by, but I wish there was a switch that I could control to leave them on while I am Just sitting . I enjoy the night air and like to sit on my deck. The lights come on if I make a movement, but then goes out.I have them I have to keep tapping them to stay on. As a sensor light they"re great, but if you want continuous light, you need to look for lights that have 2 or 3 different modes such as On, off and sensor. This way you can select what you want the lights to do for yoyr needs
customer_reviews.author: TRM

customer_reviews.title: One of the four lights has stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Well, at first all four lights worked. And three of them still do! But, for some reason, the one I really wanted to work the most, has failed! I haven’t had them very long at all. Less than two weeks. It’s in an area where sun shines on it during the day. And the one on the same fence several feet away seems to be working okay. Now I’m worried they’re all going to fail! But for now, it’s just the one that doesn’t work. Will you please replace it? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Books2Read

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 work
customer_reviews.text: They have great, bright light. But the pin off and on is pathetic. 3 work, 1 not. Doesn't make me happy. Took back off to see if maybe battery was unseated, it's a direct wire so they can't be replaced. When they quit, I guess you have to toss them. Cheap for 3 so maybe take a chance. I won't be getting any more. I prefer to pay a bit more and be able to replace batteries down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F

customer_reviews.title: they are great. TINY though
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny. Do not through out the little wire they give you as you need that in order to turn them on. But, after that, they are great. TINY though. And... i love that they do NOT light up at all when dark outside, until after there is motion. Then they are on for about 30 seconds and turn back off until there is more motion. So far, rabbits do not set them off, but humans do. AGain, the key for us is that they are not "always on".
customer_reviews.author: terster

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4
customer_reviews.text: I charged these units for 2 days and then tested them out before installing. 3 of the 4 worked well enough while one is defective. It tries to light up but only emits a faint glimmer, flickers, and then turns off immediately. This gives me pause to wonder if the other three are going to provide a length of service that makes the installation effort worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cahill

customer_reviews.title: 50% defective
customer_reviews.text: Two of the pack of four worked beautifully but two were defective and my attempt to contact the seller to replace the defective one yielded no result. It’s a risk buying these lights especially if you want to use all four.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stairs!
customer_reviews.text: So far these are amazing. I received them today and of course we instantly placed them around our deck and stairs. We turned them on and let them be. Tonight we went out to test them and they definitely have good motion sensors and are very bright! Perfect for stairs at night. They also scared away the raccoons that kept coming on our deck. Very happy so far. Now hopefully they will stand up to the rain and not get ruined like other lights have. (Will update if we have any issues)
customer_reviews.author: aubrinam

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They work surprisingly well as long as they're placed in a way to get maximum sunlight for recharging. One of them we hung too close to the roof overhang & it stopped working after a few weeks. Once we adjusted it to get more sun at peak hours (it's a fairly shady location) it began working again just fine. Since their range is limited to just a few feet (maximum 10, I'd say about 8 for sure), we bought 4 more to cover more area. For the price, was still worth the $ considering they don't use electricity or batteries.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Only working lights after Hurricane Sally
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were brighter, and I was a little disappointed as a security light. However, to light a path these are hard to beat. Mounted 3 on our boat house to light up the deck and one on the rear of the house to augment the flood lights. They held up to hurricane force winds and horizontal rain. Just remember they only put out 100 lums. So buy extras. When your power is out for 5+ days and counting you will appreciate them.
customer_reviews.author: RRArpPE

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: If they were bigger! 1. They pick up any movement! (+) 2. Easy to turn on (2) 3. Small light (I was expecting them to really light up the area below) The entire piece is 5"x 3 3/4"; smaller than my medium glove hand however the light window is 2"x2 1/2". 4. Only one screw at top of light to hold in place. 5. I think they're over priced. (Sorry) So if your area isn't very big you need to view this product is good for you. But I need the area to be well lit if an intruder came.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install for a major outdoor lighting upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as well as the newer, white model. They were absolutely seamless to install. They go up with a single screw and ... just work. I installed them low on the posts of the railings on our dark front stairs--just high enough to illuminate a couple of steps. That way, they don't blind you. If you're waffling between these and the newer, white model, that one is great, too. But these don't stick out as far, and they don't need as wide a place to screw them on. Just don't forget to stick that little pin they give you in the little hole before you tack them up.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.  Strong lights, but rarely lights up when anything is near.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with double-sided tape. They are not in shade here, but they don't seem to sense motion unless you are on top of them. Guess I didn't read the description very well. I thought they had a dim mode. I back up to woods with critters and need dim lighting and especially good motion detectors. Why is everyone trying to pass off only motion detecting devices "for better battery power?" We need devices that light when the sun goes down and light brighter when motion is detected.
customer_reviews.author: T.F.

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 year life.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set in Aug. 2016 (almost 2 years ago) and installed them in the back yard in the sun in Az. They arrived fast and worked very well. But now, they are not holding up well. The small plastic cover over the motion sensor has degraded due to the sun, and completely fallen off of 2 of them. One now charges during the day just fine, but as soon as the sun starts to go down it cycles on and off (with nothing to trigger it on) until the batteries run out, until the next days charging. They are mounted high and nothing has come in contact with the plastic cover to damage it other than the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have these mounted on my deck and railing and they give me great visibility and are exactly what I needed. They are very bright without being blinding yet somehow still manage to give ambiance rather than feeling like I have floodlights. When I come home in the dark and go in my back door through the deck they come on in a staggering configuration that makes me feel like I'm a stage actress with the lights coming up to spotlight my way -- I kind of love that. I'll be buying more for other areas around my house.
customer_reviews.author: On A Journey

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I was replacing a similar product that finally failed after 5 years in SoCal (different brand discontinued). I made the purchase off the glaring reviews however once I received them , 2 don’t work (after I mounted them ugghh) and the brightness isn’t nearly as bright as my old one. The ones that did work are ok but I’d definitely not use them for security purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these. I have them around my home outside. I used the outdoor mounting tape to hang them as I didn't want holes . They all 4 shine brightly with the slightest movement . I love them and feel safer having them at dark spots in the yard..and at entrance of my house. I used the outdoor mounting tape to install them as I didn't want holes to mount them with the screws provided. I even mounted one with the tape to a tree in the back yard...THEY WORK GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith J.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly these work great!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't so sure about purchasing these at first. After placing a few along the deck stairs and corners of the house I had to buy more! Placed them on some posts around our 2acre lot and they work great! They turn on (motion sensor) from a good distance- about 10-15 feet will trip these. The amount of light is what is really surprising! It is fairly dark where we live. So the first time I seen one kicked on at night and I could see about 1/4 acre down in front of our house, that's what really sold me on these. When a few are on, they will light up a very big area quite well.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I love the product. The box had everything in it. The light were easy to install and lit up out of the box even though they had not been in sunlight. Ps. We installed them at night. The lights do the job pretty well but could a bit brighter. I'm not complaining though as with all for installed it light up the place enough. The motion sensor is on point and so is distance which it picks up motion from. Good buy. Will be buying more. *Haven't been able to gully test weather proof and water proof fully.
customer_reviews.author: Kelo

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but only 3 of the 4 work!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the brightness of these lights in spite of their small size. They get lots of sun but I am still waiting for one to sense motion and light up. It does not sense motion but if you place your hand over it, the light comes on and goes off immediately as you remove your hand. The other three sense motion and stay on for a while thereafter. Would definitely give a 5 star rating if the 4th lamp functioned. Update: The 4th light has for the first time tonight responded as was my expectation for 5 stars.. I have therefore upgraded rating.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights - quick on. Too quick off. Update!
customer_reviews.text: They charged quickly- was able to use them that night. Bright light, enough to safely light a path. Temporarily. Shut off too fast for my needs. I was really looking for a constant night light, my mistake. These are motion sensitive, turn on only when something is moving nearby. Am keeping them for another use - they are really handy. Just know they don't stay on long and there's no setting to increase time. Update! after 3 months: 2 of the lights not working. Tried everything. Just dead. Seems I'm beyond a refund. Would not
customer_reviews.author: LadyE

customer_reviews.title: Good valve
customer_reviews.text: Well I’ll be honest, when I 1st received them I set them in the sun to charge. It rained that day and one of them started to rust. I watched them and charge them for about 3 weeks and wasn’t happy with them. I already gave up on them figuring that they wouldn’t work. I threw them in the trash can and opened it up about 5 days later and they we’re bright....lol. So I installed them and they have worked perfectly. Would’ve given them 5 stars but dinged them 1 because one light doesn’t work. They are bright enough but if ur expecting normal electrical light, forget it as being solar. But they are plenty bright!
customer_reviews.author: ronald c. warzecha

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I don't know how waterproof they are as it has not rained since I put them up. They detect any motion about 10 ft away and are fairly bright I do wish they stayed on a bit longer but seem to come back on relatively fast after going off. I haven't gotten much use from them as I am in before dark right now. However I am thinking seriously about getting another set to light the front walk. Ill update my review in a couple of months when it starts getting dark earlier.
customer_reviews.author: TnVFRrider

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all around!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. We’ve had a few light storms and these solar lights have done fantastic. They’re also kind of light bluish when they’re triggered to turn on at night. Enough to see about 10 feet around you and not too bright to bother your neighbors. I placed mine about 10 feet up btw. I’m sure if they’re closer, they’ll be brighter and less bluish. I love these lights though. Saved me a ton of money on installation and batteries because they’re easy to stick on and are solar powered. Besides, for the price, you get 4. It’s a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: FBom

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 4 work like they're supposed to....
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 pack. Motion detection works as intended, they were easy to install, but the brightness of 2 of the lights is nothing compared to the other 2. They were all installed in areas where they receive direct sunlight. Right out of the box I noticed that 2 of them were significantly dimmer before I even installed them. I figured that maybe they were just low on charge and installed them in the best area for direct sunlight. Now after a week and a half, I've noticed that 2 of the lights are definitely significantly dimmer, possibly defective.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months and died - 2 of the 4 purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in August. 5 months later 2 of the 4 purchased are no longer working. I should at least get a year out of this product and I am very disappointed. If URPower client services tries to resolve the problem, I will adjust my review. Otherwise, look elsewhere unless you like adding to the waste problems of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: I now have 25 around the property
customer_reviews.text: they work they need nothing they keep away coyotes when mounted 3 feet high. they light the way down our sidewalk to our barn and on our front porch. in summer they dont attract moths yet go off for 30 seconds bright which lets us see to get a key out and open the door then they go back to a soft glow. i have gotten many friends to buy them. all happy with the results. an intruder would think they were part of an alert system
customer_reviews.author: Billy Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really impressed. Mine don’t seem to detect motion very well and if they do it seems delayed. I only bought these to use temporarily until I purchased a security camera. I’m hoping they will work decently but right now I don’t really feel like they’re going to do their job very well. I would return but that’s honestly more of a hassle than I really want to do deal with right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work for more than one hour per day and in direct sunlight all day
customer_reviews.text: Description says that they work for up to 12 hours. I’ve got them on the fence and they sense as people come home at night. Gets dark around 5pm and these stop working by 6. They are only in for about 30 seconds at a time and today’s example would be 4 activations do season after 1 elapsed hour or 2 minutes being on. I guess that is “up to 12 hours” but 11 hours and 58 minutes less than 12 (or 11 hours whatever way you consider working time to be)
customer_reviews.author: Beeby

customer_reviews.title: Solar Motion-Sensing Lights
customer_reviews.text: (I have not used these as yet.) I have two that I have had mounted on a fence for about 18 months and one is getting a little testy so bought reserves when on sale. (I am hoping that these are the same quality as those in use.) Love the light for being able to find the keys/keyhole. The solar panels tend to get very cloudy fairly quickly but somehow they keep working even when it has been cloudy/rainy. This is a fairly inexpensive solution to security and just plain convenience and no batteries required. I would recommend this type of lighting.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Oh, how I love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I've had them in high traffic area. Wind, hail, and now snow, they're still going strong. I hung them in full sun, low enough so I could brush snow off. Had a few gray days and they still did their job. I leave for work in the middle of the night, these lights are a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: carol b

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I installed these after throwing away a similar product I bought from Costco. These things are so bright and durable! I installed them along the perimeter of my fence so my dogs can see at night when they do their #1 and #2, and it’s motion sensor activated so you know where your dogs are too. Note: Use the pin provided to turn on the light (little hole in front under sensor, spring button inside hole) They are initially on the off setting. I thought my lights were defective until I turned them on.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Lim

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised, bright for small solar light
customer_reviews.text: Good little solar lights, provide about as much light as expected for size & price. We have a half dozen around the house. Great when stepping out for just a moment to the trash dumpster or to turn the sprinklers off. Only problem is that they secure with just one screw hold through a thin plastic rim. A little over-tightening of the screw, or pull on bottom of light, and that flimsy edge breaks off. So, several of ours are now held on with double-stick foam tape instead of the original screw.
customer_reviews.author: Editor

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same light a few months ago and they were much bigger and had three different operating modes. The ones they are sending out now are almost half the size and only have a single mode, on when motion is sensed. Not even sure what to say about this bait and switch move by Amazon but these stupid inferior models are going back. If you are not selling the same product you need to make a new item listing.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be a little bigger / brighter than they are, however they do what I need them to do. I don’t like having my porch light on all night but I do like some illumination, so I love that these go on if anything gets too close be it cat or human. The motion detection is very sensitive. Easy solar charging. My shed has not been broken into again, fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I bought others but these are the best in quality, weatherproofness, and brightness. I bought these lights so I could see the raccoons and possums feeding from our kitty food bowl on our deck. (Sounds silly, I know.) We couldn’t always catch them in the act but now, when the lights are activated, we know it’s showtime! Very efficient use of energy, too—they only stay lit for a few seconds after the critter leaves. These lights are very sturdy and hold up in any kind of weather. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Lee Stee

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: Mounted these on the roof edge of our single story home along a walking path we use often, occasionally in the evening. These are plenty bright enough to see the previously unlighted path. We do not use them everyday but so far they have always had a charge when we need them. We used the included screws to mount the lights to the edge of our roof, just under the roof tiles. We do not have a gutter or we would have mounted to that.
customer_reviews.author: AQucsaiJr

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright
customer_reviews.text: Pros: extremely bright light weight and easy to install, has activating pin and screws incluced looks well-made and shipped in excellent condition. Cons: motion sensor could be more sensitive needs a bright area to charge (could probably use a few less LEDs for the small solar panel). Overall the product is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: These lights work as advertised so they get 3 stars. That said, I am not sure what the purpose of these things is supposed to be other than to let you know something triggered the motion sensor. In our case for a farm, we need to see for opening gates, finding keys, opening doors, and seeing intruders. The output is just not enough to see much of anything other than "hey the lights on"..... We will keep them but now have far bigger ones 4x this size sold on Amazon for the purposes mentioned above, which for solar lights are crazy bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: so far so good ;)
customer_reviews.text: Got the lights, installation was very easy, and they all seem to be working fine after 2 weeks (saying it only because from other reviews it seems that they either work fine or not). This despite the fact they have been set up in places that are not super-sunny, but they seem to charge well anyways. Only thing is they are ability to catch movement is not very wide, consider installing them higher if you wish to extend their reach.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: All LEDs don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 lights, let them charge in the sun for a day and then attempted to read the instructions given. However, the instructions were for a different model, one with mode switches in the back. I figured out how to turn them on, set them up, and unfortunately the pictures speak for themselves. I don’t have pics of all 4 lights because 1 of the lights would not turn on when I was taking pictures. Also, moisture can be seen inside the plastic glass after a rain in all 4. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Robert Diermayer

customer_reviews.title: Good lights and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are very dependable solar lights. They do not need a lot of sunlight to stay charged. I allowed them to charge in the full sunlight and they have remained charged even when I use them in low sunlight areas. I velcroed them to my RV and take them down when I travel and use the ones I want when we set up. If I don't use all of them, they have remained charged for days without sunlight. I placed them high enough to reach with a step ladder. I added the arrows to locate them on the RV.
customer_reviews.author: GaryLee

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: These are great LITTLE motion lights. I emphasize little because I bought them thinking I'd use them as security lights on my house. They are not anywhere near big enough. However, they will make great motion lights for my camper. They all work great and I'm very happy with them, just disappointed in myself for not reading the description and realizing how small they are.
customer_reviews.author: ntreeg

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these lights - 4 lights in each set. 4 lights are great. They come on from quite a distance and are really bright. The other set of 4 are also really bright but they do not come on until I'm within a few feet of them, which means I have to walk toward them before they come on. I was able to situate them where this isn't a big of an issue but I recommend if your lights don't light up from afar, exchange them for ones that do because the ones that do are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: seems to be an alright light so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lights,my first time of using solar lights,I have em on one side of the house,where its dark,and they work well,and seem pretty bright.People pass thru that area sometimes,and they come on to let me know that someone is walking through the yard next door which is abandon house.I really like em they really light up.If and when they ever wear out,I will purchase them again.I just hope they last me a good while,thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to install, and they light up my entire backyard! I might have to buy 4 more, because they work so well. I have not had any issue with them not working due to power issues. They don’t turn on during the day and they catch motion from quite a fair distance. My dogs set them off within what seems like a millisecond, and they stay on the entire time something is moving. I believe they shut off after like 30 seconds, but go right back on as necessary. Their brightness is fantastic, and illuminates my fairly large backyard to where I can see everything. Installation was easy as pie. Highly recommend these! They look great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Carey

product_meta.title: URPOWER Solar Lights Wireless Waterproof Motion Sensor Outdoor Light for Patio, Deck, Yard, Garden with Motion Activated Auto On/Off (4-Pack)
product_meta.description:
Size:Medium

Notes:
Two Modes: Off/Bright.NO DIM MODE.
8 LED is for 8 Lamp Beads in One Light Not for 8 Lights
Please install the unit face south and make sure the solar panel can get the sunlight directly without any shelter or glass.
Prior to first use,please allow the batteries to charge for 2 or 3 sunny days before turning the lights on for the first time.

Description:

Use this led Sensor light for your garden, backyard, deck, porch, patio, pond, veggie patch, driveway, or any outdoor location that needs a light. As a weatherproof and heatproof light, it can be installed without fear of environmental damage. As a Day Charger, Install it outside and let the sun power it up. During the day the solar light will automatically switch off to save energy; at night it will turn on when motion sensor detected so you can find your way. As it only takes 6-8 hours to fully charge, its short charging time is ideal for those short winter.
Perfect for patios, decks, pathways, stairways, driveways, garden, etc. when sensing motion it will activate the "bright light". "Bright light" turns off 30 seconds after motion stops.The solar panels capture the sun's energy during the day, providing up to 12 hours lighting after fully charged. It can be auto On/Off when motion sensor detected.

Specification:

Night sensor:10Lux Auto identify day or night
Rechargeable battery: 3.7V 900mAh
Auto identify day or night
LED Quantity: 8 LEDs
Dimensions:125*96*50mm
Motion Sensor: up to 3 meter and 120 degree detection range.

Package Content:

4 x Solar PIR Motion Sensor Light
4 x Expansion pillar-hinge
4 x Installing Screws
4 x key pin
1 x Manual
feature_bullets: UNIQUE DESIGN: We designed the internal circuit diagram of the lamp beads by ourself. There are positive and negative pole directions on the bottom of our LED, which is different with those lights on the market.
SUPER BRIGHT&LONG WORKING TIME: Compared with other common 4 or 12 led solar lights, we designed our solar lights with 8 led lights, which is brighter than 4 led and working longer than 12 led.
WEATHER RESISTANCE: IP64 waterproof and heatproof, solar powered lights, suitable for most kinds of weathers. Great outdoor light for your garden, yard, aisle, porch, patio, or driveway etc...
AUTOMATED SWITCH: Turn on at night when motion sensor detected , and automatically off after motion stops. sensing range of 10 feet with a 120 degree sensing angle.
SOLAR PANEL LIFE SPAN: 5 years - LED Life Span - 50000 hours.only takes 6-8 hours to fully charge.(Please note that 8LED is for the 8 Lamp Beads in One Light Not for 8 Lights in one package.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars13,020 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
